datacenter.description: The datacenter in which to operate.

lan.description: The LAN to place the NIC on. You can pass a LAN that doesn't exist and it will be created. Required on create.

name.description: The name or ID of the NIC. This is only required on deletes, but not on create.

subscription_user.description: The ProfitBricks username. Overrides the PB_SUBSCRIPTION_ID environment variable.

subscription_password.description: THe ProfitBricks password. Overrides the PB_PASSWORD environment variable.

state.description: Indicate desired state of the resource

wait_timeout.description: how long before wait gives up, in seconds

wait.description: wait for the operation to complete before returning
